attr.title: A Solitaire Mystery
attr.desc: A collection of 23 mysterious solitaires. The solitaires included vary from fairly standard cardgames to funky reimplementations of other games in solitaire form.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://hempuli.itch.io/a-solitaire-mystery and place the ASM.exe into ports/asm/gamedata
Works with the Jun 20, 2024 build
